AskForAQuote.description: Get in touch with us to discuss your project and receive a personalized quote.
AskForAQuote.form_description: Please fill out the questionnaire below to help us understand your personal website requirements. The more details you provide, the better we can tailor our services to your needs.
AskForAQuote.questions_budget_description: Provide an estimated budget range for your project.
AskForAQuote.questions_desiredFeatures_description: Specify any key functionalities you envision for your website.
AskForAQuote.questions_desiredFeatures_placeholder: List any specific functionalities or integrations (e.g., e-commerce, blog, contact form)
AskForAQuote.questions_existingWebsiteLink_descriptio: Please provide a link to your current website.
AskForAQuote.questions_hasExistingWebsite_description: Tell us if you already have a website, so we can see what we can improve!
AskForAQuote.questions_hasExistingWebsite_label: Do you have an existing website?
AskForAQuote.questions_needsInternationalization_desc: Enable your website to reach a global audience.
AskForAQuote.questions_projectDescription_description: Briefly describe what your website will do and its main purpose.
AskForAQuote.questions_projectDescription_placeholder: Tell us about your vision for the website...
AskForAQuote.questions_projectName_description: A unique name for your project, helping us identify your vision.
AskForAQuote.questions_targetAudience_description: Who is your website intended for? (e.g., small businesses, artists, e-commerce shoppers)
AskForAQuote.questions_timeline_description: When do you ideally want your website to be launched?
AskForAQuote.title: Ask for a Quote

BespokeHeroSection.features_accessible_description: We build websites that are <highlight>accessible</highlight> to users with disabilities.
BespokeHeroSection.features_customizable_description: We build websites that are <highlight>customizable</highlight> to your exact needs.
BespokeHeroSection.features_hosting_description: We handle all the <highlight>hosting</highlight> for you so you can focus on your business.
BespokeHeroSection.features_internationalization_descriptio: We build websites that are <highlight>accessible</highlight> to users all over the world.
BespokeHeroSection.features_iterativeDevelopment_descriptio: We build websites that are <highlight>iteratively developed</highlight> to ensure they are always up to date and meet your needs.
BespokeHeroSection.features_mobileFriendly_description: We build <highlight>responsive</highlight> websites that look great on all devices.
BespokeHeroSection.features_performant_description: We build websites that are <highlight>fast</highlight> and <highlight>efficient</highlight> using the latest technologies in web development.
BespokeHeroSection.features_uniqueDesign_description: We build websites that are <highlight>unique</highlight> and tailored to your personal brand.
BespokeHeroSection.title: We build <highlight>bespoke</highlight> websites for <highlight>individuals</highlight> to elevate your personal brand.

BespokePricingSection.calculator_contactCta: Contact us for a custom quote
BespokePricingSection.calculator_description: Select the features you need to get an estimated price for your personal website. All prices are one-time fees unless specified otherwise.
BespokePricingSection.calculator_maxPriceReached: You've reached the maximum estimated price of €3000. Please contact us for a custom quote.
BespokePricingSection.calculator_note: Prices are estimates and may vary. Max estimated project cost: €{maxPrice}.
BespokePricingSection.packages_basic_description: Ideal for personal portfolios or small informational sites.
BespokePricingSection.packages_premium_description: For individuals looking for more advanced features and deeper engagement.
BespokePricingSection.packages_standard_description: Perfect for individuals needing an online presence with key features.
BespokePricingSection.title: Transparent Pricing for Your Personal Website

BespokeWhyChooseSection.description: Tired of template websites that all look the same? A custom website allows you to create a unique online presence with <highlight>eye-catching</highlight> animations, <highlight>bold</highlight> design choices, and a <highlight>distinct</highlight> brand identity.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.features_ownership_description: Gain complete control over your digital asset. A bespoke website means you own the code and have the flexibility to implement any future vision without limitations.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.features_performance_description: Custom websites are lean and optimized for speed, ensuring a fast and smooth experience for your visitors, which improves SEO and user engagement.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.features_scalability_description: Your website grows with your business. Custom solutions are built to be easily expandable, adding new features and functionalities as your needs evolve.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.features_security_description: Tailored security measures are implemented from the ground up, providing a more robust defense against vulnerabilities compared to off-the-shelf platforms.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.features_support_description: Receive personalized support and maintenance for your unique website, ensuring it remains up-to-date, secure, and performs optimally.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.features_uniqueness_description: Stand out from the crowd with a website custom-designed to reflect your brand's unique personality and values, unlike generic templates.
BespokeWhyChooseSection.title: Why a personal website outperforms templates

FreelanceHeroSection.description: Unlock your business's full potential with bespoke web applications and expert freelance development. From concept to deployment, I deliver tailored digital solutions designed to drive growth, enhance user engagement, and streamline operations. Let's build something exceptional together.
FreelanceHeroSection.title: Custom Web Solutions for Your Business

FreelancePage.testimonials_1_author: Sander is an ambitious programmer at the beginning of his career.
FreelancePage.testimonials_1_quote: Sander is technically very good and can quickly switch. We would definitely hire Sander again.
FreelancePage.title: Testimonials

NotFoundPage.back-to-front: Go back to the front page

PortfolioSection.nawijzer_description: I helped build the platform for NaWijzer, focusing on their custom questionnaire system and the administrative dashboard. This project involved creating a robust system for questionnaire management and an easy-to-use dashboard for administrators, along with a custom-built solution for generating dynamic PDFs from the questionnaire data.
PortfolioSection.title: Portfolio

ServiceOfferingsSection.custom_description: Need a complete business solution? From customer portals to inventory management, I create scalable and secure software tailored to your commercial needs.
ServiceOfferingsSection.freelance_description: Looking to hire a skilled developer for your team? I bring expertise in modern web technologies and frameworks to help your projects succeed.
ServiceOfferingsSection.marketing_description: Tired of generic website builders? I craft visually stunning, fast-loading personal websites, perfect for individuals seeking a unique and blazing-fast online presence.
ServiceOfferingsSection.marketing_features_mobile: Perfect on all devices, from mobile to ultrawide
ServiceOfferingsSection.title: Services

TechStackSection.laravel: We use laravel for our complex systems and complete web solutions. Whether you need a simple integration or a full blown webapp, laravel is a great choice. We often combine laravel with other tools like InertiaJS which allows us to build a rich javascript supported webapp without needing a separate (sub)domain.
TechStackSection.next: We use NextJS for our website projects. NextJS uses advanced loading techniques to provide a the fastest experience. It uses React under the hood so we have access to all the great libraries out there. When possible we prefer to use NextJS over standalone React, Vue or Laravel + JavaScript Framework solutions due to the massive performance boost NextJS provides. codehouse.sandercokart.com was build with this!
TechStackSection.react: React is our go-to framework for building websites and digital tools. The reason behind this is that React has the largest community and is the most popular framework. This means we can save a lot of time by using existing solutions and libraries to speed up development.
TechStackSection.title: Tech Stack
TechStackSection.vue: We use VueJS as an alternative to React. It is often combined with NuxtJS which is much like NextJS, but for Vue. Statistically speaking, Vue is faster than React due to how it handles reactivity. It is much younger than React though and has a smaller community. This means that there are less existing solutions and libraries available.
